event.title: found the body of Juantissa Hill, 24, inside her Van Dorn Street apartment early last December

data.event: When Alexandria police found the body of Juantissa Hill, 24, inside her Van Dorn Street apartment early last December, she had not shown up for work in two days.
When Alexandria police found the body of Juantissa Hill, 24, inside her Van Dorn Street apartment early last December, she had not shown up for work in two days.

event.title: about three months later, an Alexandria grand jury indicted

data.event: On Monday, about three months later, an Alexandria grand jury indicted 31-year-old Rodney Eric Smith on charges of first-degree murder, forcible sodomy, robbery and grand larceny.

event.title: estimated that it could be a minimum of 90 days

data.event: Once here, he would go directly to trial in Alexandriaâ€™s Circuit Court, but given the circumstances and nature of the case, Sengel estimated that it could be a minimum of 90 days after he is transferred until Smith stands trial.
